description:
A YouTube video of two Alaskan malamute dogs mimicking a crawling baby as he makes his way up the hallway of his home has been rated as "too cute," so be careful as not to keep watching this if you're still at work and not prone to smiling on the job.在视频网站YouTube上，一段小婴儿爬过客厅地板，两只阿拉斯加爱斯基摩犬跟在其后爬行的视频已经被网友评为“太可爱了”。所以如果你正在上班，不合适在工作时间微笑的话，看这段视频可要小心了。

The video made by Kenji Chen has already been viewed 265,000 times according to the Huffington Post.com, and shows the two dogs named Brown Sugar and Rice Candy following an adorable little baby; however the dogs are wiggling down the hallway in a crawl following the baby wiggle and crawl.根据《赫芬顿邮报》的报道，这段视频由网友Kenji Chen制作的视频已经获得了26.5万的收视率。在这段视频里，两只分别“红糖”、“白糖”狗狗跟着可爱的小宝宝，小宝贝在前面左摇右晃地慢慢爬，狗狗们匍匐前进很快就超过了婴儿。

The mother of the baby, nicknamed Maple Syrup stated the purpose of the video is to show how pets and babies can be best friends.小婴儿的妈妈昵称叫“枫糖浆”，说拍摄这段视频的目的是告诉人们宠物和婴儿可以成为最好的朋友。

Did I mention that both dogs are rescues?我有没有提过：这两只狗其实还是小宝贝的护法么？

The American Kennel Club describes Alaskan malamutes as highly intelligent dogs who are highly athletic, affectionate, and friendly. They are an athletic breed and require daily exercise, and with their thick coats prefer cooler climates.美国犬类俱乐部成员将阿拉斯加雪橇犬成为高智商的犬类，它们具有极好的速度和力量，有爱心而且友善。它们属于好动的品种，每天都需要锻炼，而且由于长毛浓密，适合凉爽的气候。

Kenji Chen has other YouTube videos with the dogs skating and on bikes.Kenji Chen还在YouTube网上传了狗狗滑雪和骑自行车的视频。

title: 萌视频：两只狗狗陪宝宝练爬行
